content: Just beyond the chest, you can spot another large open plain. Head to the right and down the hill onto a long wooden walkway, where you’ll find a path leading back to where the Xu Dog was, and a green Wisp to grab for its Will.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Sandgate_Village_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Sandgate Village Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Village Entrance' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Lang-Li-Guhh-Baw'.
The content is as follows:
Just beyond the chest, you can spot another large open plain. Head to the right and down the hill onto a long wooden walkway, where you’ll find a path leading back to where the Xu Dog was, and a green Wisp to grab for its Will.
